page.name: Network & Infrastructure
page.page_description: Welcome to the Network and Infrastructure status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Network & Infrastructure OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Network & Infrastructure's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [RBX8][Cooling System] - Rack R831B10
incidents.message:
The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 05/02/2025 18:13 UTC.

incidents.name: [YNM][Backbone] - Network Incident Notification
incidents.message: We experienced an incident affecting our backbone infrastructure, which caused a temporary availability issues in YNM datacenter. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 05/02/2025 16:56 UTC End time : 05/02/2025 16:58 UTC Impacted Service : Backbone infrastructure Customers Impact : We experienced some flaps on the backbone network in YNM. You may expected other flaps. Root Cause : This incident was caused by operation of our provider. Ongoing Actions : The situation is currently stable and under monitoring. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [SGP/MRS][Backbone] Latency
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on the link between SGP and MRS has been resolved since 25/01/2025 . All the services are operational. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 25/01/2025 02:10 UTC End time : 25/01/2025 14:55 UTC Service impact : Latency between Europe and APAC increased. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a maintenance of one of our provider. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on Internet Access offering has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 22/01/2025 13:19 UTC End time : 22/01/2025 13:50 UTC Impacted Service : Availability Customers Impact : Some xDSL and FTTH internet access were temporarily unavailable. Root cause : Maintenance on an optical link revealed a configuration issue on our network equipment. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Here is detail for the incident : Start time : 14/01/2025 23:00 UTC End time : 15/01/2025 15:41 UTC Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue. Customers affected by this incident will be connected automatically, otherwise, a reboot will be necessary. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [RBX3][Infrastructure] - Room 41
incidents.message: Start Time : 14/01/2025 09:23 UTC End Time : 14/01/2025 09:45 UTC Service impact : Some servers in room 41 were no longer responding. Root cause : Incident due to a network issue. We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

incidents.name: [US][Backbone] Network Incident Notification
incidents.message: Start Time : 14/01/2025 09:00 UTC End Time : 14/01/2025 09:30 UTC Service impact : You may have experienced network latency between the Miami and Washington POPs. Root cause : Incident was due to a fiber cut between Miami and Washington. We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [SBG][Network] - Backbone incident notification
incidents.message: Since 13:47 UTC, no more perturbation is observed. Start time : 03/12/2024 10:31 UTC End time : 04/12/2024 13:47 UTC Root cause : fiber cut No more intervention is needed from the provider. The configuration for the few isolated services have been reverted to its state prior the event and is operational. The incident is now fully resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
